subject: URGENT UPDATE - GreenForce Conference 2-2-2020
to: gbohr@calpoly.edu, jnavar18@calpoly.edu, kdmain@calpoly.edu, pverma@calpoly.edu, dsmitche@calpoly.edu, dclague@calpoly.edu, sdross@calpoly.edu, nderbidge@calpoly.edu, jlmcdowe@calpoly.edu, ctorresb@calpoly.edu, gfiegel@calpoly.edu, lababcoc@calpoly.edu, daskay@calpoly.edu, kclark28@calpoly.edu, lcoffman@calpoly.edu, jlehr@calpoly.edu, tklein01@calpoly.edu, hglanz@calpoly.edu, denotter@calpoly.edu, mkeller@calpoly.edu, knmcgart@calpoly.edu, ynelson@calpoly.edu, wpreston@calpoly.edu, kdaldric@calpoly.edu, grees@calpoly.edu, erker@calpoly.edu, ddgillet@calpoly.edu, amaccarl@calpoly.edu, mgoldenb@calpoly.edu, bruttenb@calpoly.edu, susnyder@calpoly.edu, "Peter V. Schwartz" <pschwart@calpoly.edu>, eelghand@calpoly.edu, foaad@calpoly.edu, estauffe@calpoly.edu, blondon@calpoly.edu, rflores@calpoly.edu, apande@calpoly.edu, cwhite31@calpoly.edu, gbdurham@calpoly.edu, kpilolla@calpoly.edu, hsharris@calpoly.edu, jdenbow@calpoly.edu, nrajakar@calpoly.edu, acandrew@calpoly.edu, mhorney@calpoly.edu, taufik@calpoly.edu, jmalber@calpoly.edu, roulton@calpoly.edu, nmacdoug@calpoly.edu, ewbarret@calpoly.edu, lbjohnst@calpoly.edu, rccobb@calpoly.edu, tthatche@calpoly.edu, remberle@calpoly.edu, lweisenberg@omsslo.com, Jodi Tellier <lionjodi1@gmail.com>
body:
Greetings fellow Environmentalists! An URGENT reminder that *You are Invited!* to the first *GreenForce Collaborative* *Event*, specifically for *Environmental Leaders and Influencers* in the Community & our Tri-County Village. It's *only a week* until the GreenForce Conference takes over the Botanical Gardens, at Rancho El Chorro, in a WAVE of GREEN Creativity and Determination! WILL YOU BE THERE? Will YOU be on the list of INITIAL GreenForce Supporters and Influencers? *WE HOPE SO! * Our Community and the Planet NEED YOUR ENERGY, IDEAS & CAN-DO SPIRIT! If you have *already Registered*, we ask that you *complete **the Pre-Event Survey* by *Thursday, Jan.29* at this link ; GreenForce Pre-Event Survey Username: Greenforce Password: 805conference The *Survey's ONLY purpose* and *use *is to guide the day's Collaboration to YOUR Strengths & Interests. If you have *NOT YET REGISTERED*, Please do *by Jan.29th*, at this link; GreenForce Conference Registration . Seating is limited. *Scholarships Available! PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR STUDENTS, We want them at the table !* then *complete the survey* at this link; GreenForce Pre-Event Survey Username: Greenforce Password: 805conference THIS BEGINS A NEW DECADE AND ERA OF VISION, COLLABORATION, AND SHARED ACTION TO SAVE THE PLANET. We are INVITING YOU to be a Part of the Change we MUST HAVE, FROM TODAY GOING FORWARD. In Solidarity, Heather Howell, Stacey Hunt, & Chenda Lor, Sierra Club, Ecologistics SLO Botanical Garden Volunteers & GreenForce Organizers (805)234-5644 c -- *Heather Howell* (805)234-5644
Greetings fellow Environmentalists!
An URGENT reminder that You are Invited! to the first GreenForce Collaborative Event, specifically for Environmental Leaders and Influencers in the Community & our Tri-County Village. 

It's only a week until the GreenForce Conference takes over the Botanical Gardens, at Rancho El Chorro, 
in a WAVE of GREEN Creativity and Determination! 

WILL YOU BE THERE? Will YOU be on the list of INITIAL GreenForce Supporters and Influencers? WE HOPE SO! 
Our Community and the Planet NEED YOUR ENERGY, IDEAS & CAN-DO SPIRIT!

If you have already Registered, we ask that you complete the Pre-Event Survey by Thursday, Jan.29 at this link ; 
GreenForce Pre-Event Survey   Username: Greenforce   Password: 805conference

The Survey's ONLY purpose and use is to guide the day's Collaboration to YOUR Strengths & Interests. 

If you have NOT YET REGISTERED, Please do by Jan.29th, at this link; GreenForce Conference Registration.  
Seating is limited. Scholarships Available! PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR STUDENTS, We want them at the table !

then complete the survey at this link;
GreenForce Pre-Event Survey   Username: Greenforce   Password: 805conference

THIS BEGINS A NEW DECADE AND ERA OF VISION, COLLABORATION, AND SHARED ACTION TO SAVE THE PLANET.   
We are INVITING YOU to be a Part of the Change we MUST HAVE, FROM TODAY GOING FORWARD. 
In Solidarity, 

Heather Howell, Stacey Hunt, & Chenda Lor, 
Sierra Club,        Ecologistics      SLO Botanical Garden
Volunteers & GreenForce Organizers
(805)234-5644 c

--
Heather Howell
(805)234-5644
